definition: concerned with practical matters, an imperial decree that becomes part of the fundamental law of the land
details:
adjective
- concerned with practical matters
= example: concerned with practical matters
= synonyms: matter-of-fact
- guided by practical experience and observation rather than theory
= synonyms: practical
- of or concerning the theory of pragmatism
= synonyms: pragmatical
noun
- an imperial decree that becomes part of the fundamental law of the land
= synonyms: pragmatic sanction
